shows.title: Pen vs Sword
shows.desc: Words have a lot of power; power to inspire, connect, entertain, transform and damage. In this session, UK Youth Spoken Word Champion Matt Sowerby will perform his most powerful protest poems, before teaching a 40-minute workshop in writing for protest, which will explore how poetry can be used to build new worlds, and destroy old ones.

shows.title: KidZ theeZ dayZ
shows.desc:
A spoken word play about being a political big-mouthed teenager in the 21st century from National Youth Poetry Slam champion and activist Matt Sowerby. Expect ranting, sharp rhymes and self deprecating humour.

Age Recommendation: 13+ (show may contain content triggering to younger audience members)

Matt Sowerby, fresh out of A Levels, has already performed at the Poetry Society, the Guardian offices and House of Commons.
